description: A quick, practical guide to Stained Glass: Stories in Light.

hook.text: Chartres Cathedral's blue glass glows like nothing else on Earth.

buildup.text: Stained glass told Bible stories to illiterate congregations. Each window was a visual sermon in color.

discovery.text: The glass is colored by adding metallic oxides during manufacturing: cobalt for blue, gold for red, copper for green.

punchline.text: Stained glass turned sunlight into scripture.
